title: I think this is unfair (In my opinion :P)
body: When we get striked for 5 games and we fail to accept the game after waiting 20min and go back to the lobby and wait another 20min. I reckon we should make it so it takes up One 20min game or next time when you start a game you don't have to wait 20min.{{champion:238}}

replies.body: Do you think it is fair to waste other people's time by afking constantly?

sometimes its not even constantly you afk, maybe one game you have to go early (just figuring out tho) and the next game your internet crashes, and boom, 5 20 min queue wasting 1 hour 40 mins of you life
You do not under any circumstance get a 20 minute queue for afking once.
probably not, this is how my memory is serving me from what happened about a year ago XD
